section.title: Documentation des fonctions
section.section:
autoName() autoNamedb.function.php db.function.phpautoName
autoName ( $objectName, $field, $isTemplate, $itemtype, $entities_id = -1 )
Create a new name using a autoname field defined in a template
Paramètres
string$objectName
autoname template
string$field
field to autoname
boolean$isTemplate
true if create an object from a template
string$itemtype
item type
integer$entities_id
limit generation to an entity (default -1)
Renvoie
string new auto string
Voici le graphe des appelants de cette fonction :

Paramètres
string | array$table
table name(s)
array$condition
condition to use (default [])
Renvoie
int nb of elements in table
Count the number of elements in a table.

section.para: Count the number of elements in a table for a specific entity

entry.para: Whether to recurse or not. If true, will be conditionned on item recursivity

formalpara.title: Renvoie
formalpara.para: int nb of elements in table

formatUserName() formatUserNamedb.function.php db.function.phpformatUserName
formatUserName ( $ID, $login, $realname, $firstname, $link = 0 , $cut = 0 , $force_config = false )
Format a user name
Paramètres
$ID
integer ID of the user.
$login
string login of the user
$realname
string realname of the user
$firstname
string firstname of the user
$link
integer include link (only if $link==1) (default =0)
$cut
integer limit string length (0 = no limit) (default =0)
$force_config
boolean force order and id_visible to use common config (false by default)
Renvoie
string : formatted username
Format a user name
Paramètres
integer$ID
ID of the user.
string | null$login
login of the user
string | null$realname
realname of the user
string | null$firstname
firstname of the user
integer$link
include link (only if $link==1) (default =0)
integer$cut
limit string length (0 = no limit) (default =0)
boolean$force_config
force order and id_visible to use common config (false by default)
Renvoie
string formatted username

section.section:
getAllDataFromTable() getAllDataFromTabledb.function.php db.function.phpgetAllDataFromTable
getAllDataFromTable ( $table, $criteria = [] , $usecache = false , $order = '' )
Get data from a table in an array : CAUTION TO USE ONLY FOR SMALL TABLES OR USING A STRICT CONDITION
Paramètres
string$table
table name
array$criteria
condition to use (default [])
boolean$usecache
Use cache (false by default)
string$order
result order (default '')
Renvoie
array containing all the datas
Depuis
9.5.0
Get data from a table in an array : CAUTION TO USE ONLY FOR SMALL TABLES OR USING A STRICT CONDITION
Paramètres
string$table
Table name
?string | ?array$criteria
Request criteria
boolean$usecache
Use cache (false by default)
string$order
Result order (default '')
Renvoie
array containing all the datas

section.title: getDateCriteria()
section.para: Add dates for request

Paramètres
string$field
table.field to request
string$begin
begin date
string$end
end date
Renvoie

Get dates conditions to use in 'WHERE' clause

section.title: getDbRelations()
section.para: Get the $RELATION array. It defines all relations between tables in the DB; plugins may add their own stuff

section.section:
getEntitiesRestrictCriteria() getEntitiesRestrictCriteriadb.function.php db.function.phpgetEntitiesRestrictCriteria
getEntitiesRestrictCriteria ( $table = '' , $field = '' , $value = '' , $is_recursive = false , $complete_request = false )
Get criteria to restrict to current entities of the user
Depuis
9.2
Paramètres
string$table
table where apply the limit (if needed, multiple tables queries) (default '')
string$field
field where apply the limit (id != entities_id) (default '')
mixed$value
entity to restrict (if not set use $_SESSION['glpiactiveentities']). single item or array (default '')
boolean$is_recursive
need to use recursive process to find item (field need to be named recursive) (false by default, set to auto to automatic detection)
boolean$complete_request
need to use a complete request and not a simple one when have acces to all entities (used for reminders) (false by default)
Renvoie
array of criteria
Voici le graphe des appelants de cette fonction :

getEntitiesRestrictRequest() getEntitiesRestrictRequestdb.function.php db.function.phpgetEntitiesRestrictRequest
getEntitiesRestrictRequest ( $separator = "AND" , $table = "" , $field = "" , $value = '' , $is_recursive = false , $complete_request = false )
Get SQL request to restrict to current entities of the user
Paramètres
string$separator
separator in the begin of the request (default AND)
string$table
table where apply the limit (if needed, multiple tables queries) (default '')
string$field
field where apply the limit (id != entities_id) (default '')
mixed$value
entity to restrict (if not set use $_SESSION['glpiactiveentities_string']). single item or array (default '')
boolean$is_recursive
need to use recursive process to find item (field need to be named recursive) (false by default)
boolean$complete_request
need to use a complete request and not a simple one when have acces to all entities (used for reminders) (false by default)
Renvoie
string the WHERE clause to restrict
Voici le graphe des appelants de cette fonction :

getTreeLeafValueName() getTreeLeafValueNamedb.function.php db.function.phpgetTreeLeafValueName
getTreeLeafValueName ( $table, $ID, $withcomment = false , $translate = true )
Get the Name of the element of a Dropdown Tree table
Paramètres
$table
string Dropdown Tree table
$ID
integer ID of the element
$withcomment
boolean 1 if you want to give the array with the comments (false by default)
$translate
boolean (true by default)
Renvoie
string : name of the element
Voir également
getTreeValueCompleteName()
Get the Name of the element of a Dropdown Tree table
Paramètres
string$table
Dropdown Tree table
integer$ID
ID of the element
boolean$withcomment
1 if you want to give the array with the comments (false by default)
boolean$translate
(true by default)
Renvoie
string name of the element
Voir également
DbUtils::getTreeValueCompleteName
Voici le graphe des appelants de cette fonction :

section.title: getTreeValueCompleteName()
section.para: Get completename of a Dropdown Tree table

Paramètres
string$table
Dropdown Tree table
integer$ID
ID of the element
boolean$withcomment
1 if you want to give the array with the comments (false by default)
boolean$translate
(true by default)
boolean$tooltip
(true by default) returns a tooltip, else returns only 'comment'
string$default
default value returned when item not exists
Renvoie
string : completename of the element
Voir également
getTreeLeafValueName()
Get completename of a Dropdown Tree table

entry.para: 1 if you want to give the array with the comments (false by default)
(true by default) returns a tooltip, else returns only 'comment'
default value returned when item not exists

$ID
integer value ID
$wholename

$level

show name category DO NOT DELETE THIS FUNCTION : USED IN THE UPDATE

getUserName() getUserNamedb.function.php db.function.phpgetUserName
getUserName ( $ID, $link = 0 , $disable_anon = false )
Get name of the user with ID=$ID (optional with link to user.form.php)
Paramètres
$ID
integer ID of the user.
$link
integer 1 = Show link to user.form.php 2 = return array with comments and link (default =0)
$disable_anon
bool disable anonymization of username.
Renvoie
string : username string (realname if not empty and name if realname is empty).

integer$link
1 = Show link to user.form.php 2 = return array with comments and link (default =0)
